nodes.text: The Chaf family was a powerful Chiss family that was one of the Nine Ruling Families of the Chiss Ascendancy.

During the Nikardun campaigns, the fellow Ruling Irizi family sought an alliance with the Chaf family. According to Haplif of the Agbui, the Chaf family mildly opposed their fellow ruling Mitth family but were not "particularly enthusiastic" about the Irizi either.

Chaf'pri'uhme, core name Afpriuh, was a member of the Chaf family who held the rank of Senior Commander in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet aboard the heavy cruiser Springhawk under Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo.
